ygData.subject: Re: Okay I have a few questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I was also wondering how to make the Peace Keeper Staff. I know that it is better than a Glowing Crook Staff and I was wondering if anyone knew how to build
ygData.messageBody:
I was also wondering how to make the Peace Keeper Staff. I know that it
is better than a Glowing Crook Staff and I was wondering if anyone knew
how to build it. Can u give me location of parts and how to assemble.
Thanks a bunch !

- Tybit (Dwarf Cleric)

Allsar wrote:

> The pieces of mallet head and handle are part of the Thex Mallet
> quest. It is basically an evil quest because the NPCs you need to
> talk to are dark elves. There is a third piece on the zombie
> Commander Windstream in Befallen (level 20+ zombie), but to assemble
> the pieces you have to go to Neriak. I dont have the stats on hand,
> but you can find it in EQ`Lizer (http://www.gamez.net/eq) and people I
> know who have it say its more useful in the throwing slot because it
> gives +sv magic I believe.Allsar Olath`Vlos - Rathe
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: The Scotts <jtscott@...>
> To: eq-clerics@onelist.com <eq-clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 3:37 PM
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Okay I have a few questions
> First I was in the lower lvl of befallen and in about 1hr i
> got two pieces of some kind of mallet the head and the
> handle what other pieces do i need,what where do i take it
> to be built,and what are its stats?(compared to the
> screaming mace) also what is this peace keeper staff about
> can i have info on hopw to start the quest and who to talk
> ot and where the stuff can be found.
> THANKS, KRIX MATHER <HIGH
> PRIEST>POVAR SERVER
>
